titles.title: A resolution prohibiting text messaging by employees of the Senate while driving on official business.
A resolution prohibiting text messaging by employees of the Senate while driving on official business.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: Prohibits Senate employees from text messaging when: (1) driving a government-owned or -leased vehicle; (2) driving a privately owned or leased vehicle while on official business; or (3) using Senate-provided text messaging equipment while driving any vehicle at any time.
